aXe Playground

Fixture Configuration

Start by setting up your fixture. To use a preset fixture, choose a 'Type' then the 'Name' of a specific rule or check.

You can also modify the HTML manually. Click 'Render' to update the fixture.

Rendered Fixture

Everything in the area below will be targeted by aXe when you analyze the page.

aXe Options

Modify the options object below and click 'Analyze' to update the results. For more info, see the aXe documentation for the Options parameter.
